summary:
Sometimes mods with exclusive functions conflicts with each others, because although some ESP records that is identical to it\'s master can\'t be left \"blank\" (that is, won\'t get removed by using \"Remove \"Identical to Master\" records\" in TES5Edit.
I try to fix them here, so they can be used together without no consequences.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my bad English, I\'m not a native speaker. Hope you can understand what I\'m trying to say (and get the correct meaning)...

Sometimes mods with exclusive functions conflicts with each others, because although some ESP records that is identical to it\'s master can\'t be left \"blank\" (that is, won\'t get removed by using \"Remove \"Identical to Master\" records\" in TES5Edit.

I try to fix them here, so they can be used together without no conflicts.

=== List of Patches ===

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20345]FTFI Fast Travel from Indoors[/url] vs. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1875]RCRN v36 HDR - Your AllinOne Lighting and Immersion mod[/url]:[/b][list][*] Make FTFI respects RCRN\'s lighting adjustments.
[*]Requirements: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]USKP[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1875]RCRN[/url]
[*]Latest Version: 0001[/list]
[b][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26558]Better Sorting by eclips3[/url] vs. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13841]Longer potions Smithing Barter Enchanting Carryweight[/url]:[/b][list][*][/list]
author: Palatis
